name: Liquity LUSD
description: Liquity is a decentralized borrowing protocol that allows you to borrow LUSD (a USD pegged stablecoin) interest free using Ether as collateral. The loans are secured by a Stability Pool containing LUSD and by borrowers collectively acting as guarantors of last resort.

en.description: Liquity is a decentralized borrowing protocol that allows you to borrow LUSD (a USD pegged stablecoin) interest free using Ether as collateral. The loans are secured by a Stability Pool containing LUSD and by borrowers collectively acting as guarantors of last resort.

fr.description: Liquity is a decentralized borrowing protocol that allows you to borrow LUSD (a USD pegged stablecoin) interest free using Ether as collateral. The loans are secured by a Stability Pool containing LUSD and by borrowers collectively acting as guarantors of last resort.

es.description: Liquity es un protocolo de préstamo descentralizado que le permite pedir prestado LUSD (una moneda estable vinculada al USD) sin intereses utilizando Ether como garantía. Los préstamos están garantizados por un grupo de estabilidad que contiene LUSD y por prestatarios que actúan colectivamente como garantes de último recurso.

de.description: Liquity is a decentralized borrowing protocol that allows you to borrow LUSD (a USD pegged stablecoin) interest free using Ether as collateral. The loans are secured by a Stability Pool containing LUSD and by borrowers collectively acting as guarantors of last resort.

pt.description: Liquity is a decentralized borrowing protocol that allows you to borrow LUSD (a USD pegged stablecoin) interest free using Ether as collateral. The loans are secured by a Stability Pool containing LUSD and by borrowers collectively acting as guarantors of last resort.

el.description: Liquity is a decentralized borrowing protocol that allows you to borrow LUSD (a USD pegged stablecoin) interest free using Ether as collateral. The loans are secured by a Stability Pool containing LUSD and by borrowers collectively acting as guarantors of last resort.

tr.description: Liquity, Ether'i teminat olarak kullanarak faizsiz LUSD (USD sabitlenmiş bir stablecoin) ödünç almanızı sağlayan merkezi olmayan bir borçlanma protokolüdür. Krediler, LUSD içeren bir İstikrar Havuzu ve toplu olarak son çare garantörü olarak hareket eden borçlular tarafından güvence altına alınmıştır.

vi.description: Liquity is a decentralized borrowing protocol that allows you to borrow LUSD (a USD pegged stablecoin) interest free using Ether as collateral. The loans are secured by a Stability Pool containing LUSD and by borrowers collectively acting as guarantors of last resort.

zh.description: Liquity 是个去中心化借贷平台，它可以让用户抵押 ETH 以 0 利息借出 LUSD（錨定美元的稳定币）。债务的担保是由 LUSD 稳定池和借款人提供的。

hi.description: Liquity एक विकेन्द्रीकृत उधार प्रोटोकॉल है जो आपको LUSD (एक अमरीकी डालर आंकी गई स्थिर मुद्रा) ब्याज मुक्त उधार लेने की अनुमति देता है जो ईथर को संपार्श्विक के रूप में उपयोग करता है। ऋण LUSD युक्त एक स्थिरता पूल द्वारा सुरक्षित हैं और उधारकर्ता सामूहिक रूप से अंतिम उपाय के गारंटर के रूप में कार्य करते हैं।

ja.description: Liquity is a decentralized borrowing protocol that allows you to borrow LUSD (a USD pegged stablecoin) interest free using Ether as collateral. The loans are secured by a Stability Pool containing LUSD and by borrowers collectively acting as guarantors of last resort.
